Title: .hack//The Movie: Sekai no Mukou ni
Description: ['In 2024, the computer network prevails throughout daily life. Sora Yuuki is a 14-year-old girl. One day, she is invited to an online game "The World". After an accident in the game, the real world begins to deform.']
